subject: Football
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Steve Wright, a 12-year N.F.L. tackle whose teams included the Giants, was the inspiration for the hulking figure depicted on the league’s Walter Payton Man of the Year award.
snippet: Steve Wright, a 12-year N.F.L. tackle whose teams included the Giants, was the inspiration for the hulking figure depicted on the league’s Walter Payton Man of the Year award.
